A side note: Shouldn't this preference page be in a UI plugin rather than a runtime plugin (org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller) ?
Not containable in 4.3 and retarget to 4.4. Please let me know if you have any concern.
Retarget to future due to resource limitation.
This will be reimplemented by Navid.
Updated target to match the iteration when this defect has been processed
